dcterms:creator: B. Cserna
W. J. Doyle
J. S. Ramsdell
W. Ruml
dcterms:description: A benchmark domain designed to evaluate safe real-time methods, where the state is two-dimensional consisting of distance and altitude. The agent must traverse a predefined distance while managing altitude and avoiding obstacles that block the way at higher altitudes.
dcterms:title: Airspace

dcterms:creator: B. Cserna
W. J. Doyle
J. S. Ramsdell
W. Ruml
dcterms:description: A benchmark domain where an agent with inertia and limited acceleration traverses a grid, avoiding blocked cells. The agent's state includes position and velocity, and dead-ends are reached upon collision with obstacles.
dcterms:title: Racetrack

dcterms:creator: S. Kiesel
E. Burns
W. Ruml
dcterms:description: An extension of a domain used for real-time search where an agent moves in a grid while avoiding moving obstacles. The agent reaches a dead-end if it collides with an obstacle before reaching a goal state.
dcterms:title: Traffic
